## ğŸ”‘ Key Features Implemented

### 1. Fail-Safe Token Handling âœ…

-   Missing platform credentials log warnings but don't crash
-   Each platform operates independently
-   Graceful degradation ensures maximum platform coverage

### 2. Idempotency âœ…

-   `.postmap.json` tracks published posts by platform
-   Existing posts trigger UPDATE operations
-   New posts trigger CREATE operations
-   Prevents duplicate publishing

### 3. Robust Error Handling âœ…

-   Exponential backoff retry logic (3 attempts)
-   Network error recovery
-   Per-platform error isolation
-   Comprehensive JSON-lines logging

### 4. CLI Flags âœ…

```bash
npm run publish              # Live publishing
npm run publish -- --dry-run # Simulate without API calls
npm run publish -- --mock    # Use mock server
npm run publish -- --concurrency=5  # Custom concurrency
```

### 5. Static Site Generation âœ…

-   Responsive, mobile-friendly design
-   Post listing with pagination support
-   Individual post pages with SEO meta tags
-   "Submit a Post" button for community contributions

### 6. GitHub Actions Automation âœ…

-   Automatic deployment to GitHub Pages
-   Scheduled daily publishing (9 AM UTC)
-   Issue-to-post workflow with allowlist moderation
-   Automatic .postmap.json commits

---

## ğŸš€ Quick Start

```bash
# 1. Install dependencies
npm install

# 2. Configure environment
cp .env.example .env.local
# Edit .env.local with your API credentials

# 3. Test with mock server
npm run mock-server  # Terminal 1
npm run publish -- --mock --dry-run  # Terminal 2

# 4. Build static site
npm run build

# 5. Publish for real
npm run publish
```
